newsitem.title: USA: Donnelley unit woes cause Q4 loss.
newsitem.headline: Donnelley unit woes cause Q4 loss.

text.p: Donnelley Enterprise Solutions Inc said Monday higher labor costs at its LANSystems division and a charge to close the unit's San Diego office caused a loss in the fourth quarter ended December 31.
The company said it lost $471,000, or $0.09 a share, in the period, comnpared with net income of $202,000, or $0.04 a share, a year ago.
Revenues rose to $25.4 million from $23.8 million, the company said.
Donnelley Enterprise Solutions provides integrated information management systems to law firms, investment banks and accounting firms.
Its shares were trading up 1/4 Monday at 10-1/2.
